description: This dataset includes Police In-Car video activities. Data shows activity of In-Car recorded video including, Officer Serial Number, Start (Date & Time) of video, post recording activity code and description. Data is refreshed on a weekly basis. Data is records of video and does not imply that there is actual playable video associated.

name: COBAN Logs
